Title: Dead and Alive
Plot: The gang moves into Infeld?s beach house and Peter is quick to pursue their beautiful neighbor Charlie. Jared and Peter must prove a veteran is alive after a clerical error wrongfully pronounced him deceased and he is poised to lose his house. Karp is increasingly concerned about Infeld?s erratic behavior, which comes to a head when he befriends a Ukrainian drive-through worker and plans to marry her for a visa extension so she can pursue the American dream.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
